## GARCH(1) of Texting driving (MD)

$$\alpha_i: \textrm{Texting indication}$$

$$\sigma_t^2 = \alpha_0 + \alpha_{i} + \alpha_1 a^2_{t-1} + \beta \sigma^2_{t-1}$$
